channel.title: Rep++ For Easy Question!
channel.description: mk havnt coded uin a while and forgot how to make a wep 2handed i thought it was in item.java but cant figure out how to add it there rep++ for help

item.title: Rep++ For Easy Question!
item.dc:creator: @nicks nicks
item.description:
@nicks wrote:

[quote=“Vince, post:4, topic:372860”][quote author=nicks link=topic=468886.msg3428100#msg3428100 date=1292107384]
int isnt there that was my first thought, i’ve been searching around the forums some ppl say i can be in client.java but not much in there either. and its delta
[/quote]

It is in client.java… int[] two_hand

[quote]

  if (id == 6609 || id == 1307 || id == 1309 || id == 1311 || id == 1313
        || id == 1315 || id == 1317 || id == 1319 || id == 7158 || id == 13710)
  // 2 handers

i added teh 13710 thats the item im trying to make 2h[/quote]

Animations for them.[/quote]thank you that worked rep++

Read full topic

item.title: Rep++ For Easy Question!
item.dc:creator: @Vince2 Vince,
item.description:
@Vince2 wrote:

nicks:

int isnt there that was my first thought, i’ve been searching around the forums some ppl say i can be in client.java but not much in there either. and its delta

It is in client.java… int[] two_hand

if (id == 6609 || id == 1307 || id == 1309 || id == 1311 || id == 1313 || id == 1315 || id == 1317 || id == 1319 || id == 7158 || id == 13710) // 2 handers

i added teh 13710 thats the item im trying to make 2h

Animations for them.

item.title: Rep++ For Easy Question!

item.description:
@nicks wrote:

int isnt there that was my first thought, i’ve been searching around the forums some ppl say i can be in client.java but not much in there either. and its delta
also this is what i find in client.java

	if (id == 6609 || id == 1307 || id == 1309 || id == 1311 || id == 1313
			|| id == 1315 || id == 1317 || id == 1319 || id == 7158 || id == 13710)
	// 2 handers

i added teh 13710 thats the item im trying to make 2h

item.title: Rep++ For Easy Question!
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

PI or Delta?

Delta - in Item.java there should be a:

public int[] twohanded

Add the id to that int.
